Source.Name: gstreamer-next
Source.Description: GStreamer is a streaming media framework, based on graphs of filters which operate on media data. Applications using this library can do anything from real-time sound processing to playing videos, and just about anything else media-related.

Source.Name: gst-plugins-base-next
Source.Description: GStreamer base plugins are a well-groomed and well-maintained collection of GStreamer plugins and elements, spanning the range of possible types of elements one would want to write for GStreamer. It also contains helper libraries and base classes useful for writing elements. A wide range of video and audio decoders, encoders, and filters are included.

Source.Name: gst-plugins-ugly-next
Source.Description: GStreamer Ugly Plug-ins is a set of plug-ins that have good quality and correct functionality, but distributing them might pose problems. The license on either the plugins or the supporting libraries might not be how we'd like. The code might be widely known to present patent problems.

Source.Name: cheese
Source.Description: Cheese is a webcam application that uses your webcam to take photos and videos, apply fancy special effects and share fun with others.
Kameranızdan fotoğraf çekin, video kayıt edin ve efektler ekleyin.

Package.Name: cheese-docs
Package.Summary: Help files and API documents for cheese library

Source.Name: gst-plugins-bad-next
Source.Summary: A set of GStreamer plug-ins that aren't up to par compared to the rest
Source.Description: GStreamer Bad Plug-ins is a set of plug-ins that aren't up to par compared to the rest. They might be close to being good quality, but they're missing something - be it a good code review, some documentation, a set of tests, a real live maintainer, or some actual wide use.

Source.Name: gst-plugins-good-next
Source.Summary: A set of good-quality plugins for GStreamer
Source.Description: gst-plugins-good contains a set of mature plugins and elements for GStreamer.

Source.Name: gst-libva-next
Source.Summary: Gstreamer plugin for the libav codec
Source.Description: Gstreamer plugin for the libav codec.

Source.Name: js185
Source.Description: Spidermonkey est l'Implémentation C de Javascript par Mozilla.
Spidermonkey is Mozilla's C implementation of JavaScript.
Mozilla'nın Javascript'in C implementasyonu.
Spidermonkey es la implementación de JavaScript con C de Mozilla.

Source.Name: glib2
Source.Summary: La librairie GLib2 de routines C.
A library of handy utility functions
C programlama dili için glib kütüphanesi
Source.Description: glib2 is the low-level core library that forms the basis for projects such as GTK+ and GNOME. It provides data structure handling for C, portability wrappers, and interfaces for such runtime functionality as an event loop, threads, dynamic loading, and an object system.

glib2, GTK+ ve GNOME gibi projelerin temelini oluşturan düşük seviyeli çekirdek kütüphanedir. C için veri yapıları, taşınabilirlik katmanları ve çeşitli çalışma zamanı işlevleri için arabirimler sunar.

Source.Name: webkit-gtk3
Source.Summary: An opensource web browser engine for GTK+ 3.x applications
GTK+ 3.x uygulamaları için açık kaynak internet tarayıcısı motoru
Port osadzalnego komponentu WWW WebKit do GTK+ 3.x
Source.Description: The GTK+ 3.x port of WebKit is intended to provide a browser component primarily for users of the portable GTK+ 3.x UI toolkit on platforms like Linux.

WebKit'in GTK+ 3.x sürümü, Linux benzeri sistemlerde GTK+ 3.x grafik araç kiti kullanıcılarının başlıca tarayıcı bileşenleri ihtiyaçlarını karşılayacak biçimde tasarlanmış bir internet tarayıcısı motorudur.

Package.Name: webkit-gtk3-devel
Package.Summary: Development files for GTK+ port of WebKit
WebKit'in GTK+ 3.x sürümü için geliştirme dosyaları
Pliki programistyczne komponentu WebKit dla GTK+ 3.x

mate-calc, Mate masaüstü için hesap makinesi.

Source.Description: Engrampa is an archive manager for the MATE environment. This means that you can create and modify archives; view the content of an archive; view and modify a file contained in the archive; extract files from the archive.

Source.Name: gnome-backgrounds

Source.Name: file-roller
Source.Description: File-manager is a archive manager that create, modify and extract various archive formats with compression support
File-roller çeşitli arşiv dosyalarını sıkıştırma desteği ile oluşturan, açan, düzenleyen bir arşiv yönetim uygulamasıdır.

Source.Name: gnome-shell-extensions
Source.Summary: A collection of extensions providing additional and optional functionality to GNOME Shell
Gnome-shell'e seçimlik yeni işlevsellikler katan eklentiler seçkisi
Source.Description: gnome-shell-extensions is a collection of extensions providing additional and optional functionality to GNOME Shell.
gnome-shell-extensions, Gnome-shell'e seçimlik yeni işlevsellikler katan eklentilerin bir seçkisini sunar.

Package.Name: gnome-shell-extensions-alternate-tab
Package.Summary: gnome-shell-extensions-alternate-tabe, Classic Alt+Tab behavior for GNOME Shell

Package.Name: gnome-shell-extensions-apps-menu
Package.Summary: gnome-shell-extensions-apps-menu, Application menu for GNOME Shell

Package.Name: gnome-shell-extensions-auto-move-windows
Package.Summary: gnome-shell-extensions-auto-move-windows, Assign specific workspaces to applications in GNOME Shell

Package.Name: gnome-shell-extensions-drive-menu
Package.Summary: gnome-shell-extensions-drive-menu, Drive status menu for GNOME Shell

Package.Name: gnome-shell-extensions-launch-new-instance
Package.Summary: gnome-shell-extensions-launch-new-instance, Always launch a new application instance for GNOME Shell

Package.Name: gnome-shell-extensions-places-menu
Package.Summary: gnome-shell-extensions-places-menu, Places status menu for GNOME Shell

Package.Name: gnome-shell-extensions-systemmonitor
Package.Summary: gnome-shell-extensions-systemmonitor, System Monitor for GNOME Shell

Package.Name: gnome-shell-extensions-user-theme
Package.Summary: gnome-shell-extensions-user-theme, Support for custom themes in GNOME Shell

Package.Name: gnome-shell-extensions-window-list
Package.Summary: gnome-shell-extensions-windows-list, Display a window list at the bottom of the screen in GNOME Shell

Package.Name: gnome-shell-extensions-windowsnavigator
Package.Summary: gnome-shell-extensions-windowsnavigator, Support for keyboard selection of windows and workspaces in GNOME Shell

Package.Name: gnome-shell-extensions-xrandr-indicator
Package.Summary: gnome-shell-extensions-xrandr-indicator, Xrandr indicator for GNOME Shell

Source.Name: libsocialweb
Source.Description: Folks is a library that aggregates people from multiple sources (eg, Telepathy connection managers and eventually Evolution Data Server, Facebook, etc.) to create metacontacts.
